title: US tech titans pay homage to Trump at White House dinner
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — Tech world executives showered Donald Trump with praise on Thursday during a rare dinner that saw the US president host some of the most important players in artificial intelligence (AI) at the White House.
content:

title: Warner Bros sues Midjourney for copyright infringement
description: WARNER Bros. Discovery sued the artificial intelligence (AI) photo generation company Midjourney on Thursday, saying it brazenly stole the studio’s works to generate images of Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Bugs Bunny, Scooby-Doo and other copyrighted characters.

title: OpenAI to launch its first AI chip in 2026 with Broadcom
description: OPENAI is set to produce its first artificial intelligence (AI) chip next year in partnership with US semiconductor giant Broadcom, the Financial Times (FT) reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.
content:

title: US AI giant Anthropic bars Chinese-owned entities
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Anthropic is barring Chinese-run companies and organizations from using its artificial intelligence (AI) services, the US tech giant said as it toughened restrictions on “authoritarian regions.”
content:
SAN FRANCISCO, California — Anthropic is barring Chinese-run companies and organizations from using its artificial intelligence (AI) services, the US tech giant said as it toughened restrictions on “authoritarian regions.”

title: Broadcom Shares Soar On Work With OpenAI To Create New AI Chip
description: Broadcom Inc. is helping OpenAI design and produce an artificial intelligence accelerator from 2026, getting into a lucrative sphere dominated by Nvidia Corp. Its shares jumped by the most since April. The two firms plan to ship the first chips in that lineup starting next year, a person familiar with the matter said, asking to remain anonymous discussing a private deal. OpenAI will initially use the chip for its own internal purposes, the Financial Times reported earlier.
content:

title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
description: The playoff-bound Ballers of the independent Pioneer League are turning to AI to manage most aspects of Saturday’s home game against the Great Falls Voyagers at Raimondi Park.
content:
By JANIE McCAULEY, Associated Press
OAKLAND — Oakland Ballers manager Aaron Miles will leave it to artificial intelligence to decide when to pinch hit or replace his pitcher.

title: AI: Empowering climate resilience in developing nations
description: THE escalating climate crisis demands innovative solutions. In developing countries, where vulnerability to climate impacts is often highest, artificial intelligence (AI) emerges as a powerful tool for climate action and enhancing societal resilience. While presenting its own set of challenges, it offers unique opportunities to adapt, mitigate and build a more sustainable future.

title: Warner Bros sues Midjourney over AI-generated images of Superman and Bugs Bunny
description: Warner Bros is suing artificial intelligence company Midjourney for copyright infringement, alleging that the start-up enables its millions of subscribers to create AI-generated images and videos of copyrighted characters such as Superman and Bugs Bunny.
content:
It is the third big Hollywood studio to sue Midjourney in Los Angeles federal court after Disney and Universal filed a joint lawsuit in June.
Midjourney, based in San Francisco, did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
The lawsuit allege... [2653 chars]

title: Tesla shareholders to vote on xAI investment in November
description: Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in November to decide if the electric carmaker should invest in Elon Musk's closely held artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
content:
(Bloomberg/Kurt Wagner) — Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in November to decide if the electric carmaker should invest in Elon Musk’s closely held artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
